usage.cn: 为何好女孩总喜欢坏男孩？
usage.eng: Why do the good girls, always want the bad boys?

usage.cn: 等我长大了，我要先生一个哥哥，然后再生一个妹妹；以后，哪个臭小子谁敢让我女儿哭，我儿子一定揍扁他。
usage.eng: When I grow up, I want a son first, then a daughter; so my son would beat up any boy that makes my little girl cry.

usage.cn: 很多时候，男人会让你觉得他爱上了你，其实他真没有；而女人会让你觉得她不可能会爱上你，结果她却动了心。
usage.eng: A boy will make you think he loves you, but he really doesn't. A girl will make you think she doesn't love you, when she really does.
